data.text:
The is in good location. Shops near by. Adel was our house keeping person. Adel was excellent. Restaurant staff to name a few Mohammed (drinks), Sheriff looked after us, as majority of us were vegetarian. Two Al A carte restaurants Lebanese and Ligolini Italian highly recommended. Entertainment team were excellent. Beach is excellent.
Just a few suggestions, walking area (tiles) were slippery, especially when wet, may be put some rubber mats. Food should be labelled clearly ( some said vegetarian), but when asked they had fish or chicken stock. Bathroom a bit dated, just needs upgrading. We would definitely go back to resort.
data.title: Maritime Jolie Ville  Resort & Casino Sharm El Sheikh

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest , 

On behalf of all Maritim Jolie ville Resort & Casino team we would like to thank you for choosing our hotel for your vacation. We highly appreciate your high rating of our Resort. We are delighted to know that you was satisfied with the hotel facilities and services and your holiday was nice. It was our pleasure to look after you during this period and we will be glad to welcoming you back in the nearest future
owner_response.author: Rooms Division Manager

data.text:
Wonderful suroundings/gardens.I like the arrangement on the main alley with the white arches reminding me of the TORI doors from Japan.Very spiritual experience going through them.
Very clean and tidy rooms and everything!
And i enjoyed every meal
data.title: 5 points for the entertaining team.Great girls ang guys!Thank you!

data.text:
My wife and I stayed at the Maritim Resort & Casino From 8th March to 18th March again we stayed in the Sports Area . The rooms are excellent, housekeeping is first class overseen by Mr Adel
We stayed on a bed and breakfast basis and I must say that breakfast was made very special for us each morning by 
 Hossan. If you visit Naama Bay you must try the Hotels Italian Restaurant Zigiolin's the food is fantastic and the atmosphere is made special by Chef Emad

on our stay we used the hotels laundry service which I must say was excellent, big thank you to Mr Bakry. 

Again from Bell Service to beach staff everyone at reception specifically Roa and security everyone does a first class job. We have used this hotel for many years a I must say it is improving all the time
data.title: Again a wonderful stay at the Maritim Resort & Casino

data.text:
We have really enjoyed our stay here, the staff are very friendly & are always helpful.
There is a wide variety of food that is well cooked & displayed, also plenty of choices for children including pizza, burgers, chips deserts etc…
The animation team are all excellent helping you to enjoy your holiday & have a good time!
There is an entertainment program every day for children & adults morning, afternoon & evening.
Overall we had a great stay & would recommend to couples & families!
data.title: Enjoyable vacation 5*

data.text: We spent two weeks in Jolie Ville, and we are very satisfied with everything, the big and very clean room, the rich buffet , the various kitchen, the beach, very clean and big  and the unbelivieable staff! Everybody, which works here is very polite, helpful, speeks gut English. I have to mention the very big and very beautiful Garden/Park, where the gardners work every day for to keep it fresh. Thanks to all the staff, to the management, which furfill every whish from the tourists here! Big thanks! The best place to stay in Sharm El Sheikh. We all come again with biggest pleasure here!
data.title: Dream holidays
